title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
content: TIME LEFT: END TIME: 12/17/2023 09:30 PM AM NYCLIMITED EDITION - UNLOADED 2022 RC Lost Coin Series sets    https://kollektra.com/collectible/rchluzhttps://kollektra.com/collectible/rchlusMore info about coins:Silver metal coin (0.01 BTC on front of coin)Metal: .999 Fine Pure Silver Diameter: 34.9mm    Weight: 24 grams   (0.85 Oz)Engraved serial number: No Quantity: Limited to 100 Previous sales:  https://auctions.stacksbowers.com/lots/view/3-1607OH/unfunded-2022-rarity-check-lost-coin-001-bitcoin-silver-ms-69-pl-icg  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472046.0Alloy coin (0.001 BTC on front of coi ):Material: Zinc AlloyPlating:  Silver Finish: ProofDiameter 34.9 mm Engraved serial number: NoQuantity: Limited to 200There are three lots:Lot 1- Pair of silver and alloy  Lot 2- Pair of silver and alloy  Lot 3- Pair of silver and alloy    For each lot, starting bid: 0.004BTC    MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001 BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places** **Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING

comments.author: anonymousminer
comments.body: The last 3 auctioned sold for 0.003BTC with only 1 bid for each lot.  Bitcoin is also significantly higher in price.  Why the increase to 0.004BTC as a starting bid???

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: anonymousminer on December 05, 2023, 02:04:09 PMThe last 3 auctioned sold for 0.003BTC with only 1 bid for each lot.  Bitcoin is also significantly higher in price.  Why the increase to 0.004BTC as a starting bid???HelloThank you for question. StacksBowers listing for single coin sold for 264$ which is 0.0062BTCWe are offering the pair here cheaper than that.Have we answered the question?

comments.body: Quote from: raritycheck on December 05, 2023, 02:34:46 PMQuote from: anonymousminer on December 05, 2023, 02:04:09 PMThe last 3 auctioned sold for 0.003BTC with only 1 bid for each lot.  Bitcoin is also significantly higher in price.  Why the increase to 0.004BTC as a starting bid???HelloThank you for question. StacksBowers listing for single coin sold for 264$ which is 0.0062BTCWe are offering the pair here cheaper than that.Have we answered the question?No, not really, but good luck with your sale.
